price: Basi mfikieni Firauni na mwambieni: Hakika sisi ni Mitume wa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Muelekeeni Firauni na mwambieni: Sisi ni Watume wawili tumetumwa na Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fatiyā fir'ʿawna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
